Topic.Title: Please help! Page links don´t work

Posts.EditableText: Hy there, i just finished my first gamebook and everything works fine. Now i used Quest JS to convert the quest-game. After useing Quest JS (quest compiler) all page links didn´t work in the result  (html version). Please help. I worked a loooong time on this questbook and i want the share it as a app with all my friends. thx
